devdoc.details: A contract to create and manage instances of ChromaticBP.

OnlyAccessableByDao().details: Throws an `OnlyAccessableByDao` error if the caller is not the DAO.

ChromaticBPCreated(address,address).details: Emitted when a Chromatic BP is successfully created.

params.bp: The address of the created Chromatic BP.
params.lp: The address of the associated Liquidity Provider (LP).

SetAutomateBP(address).details: Emitted when the automate contract for Chromatic BPs is set.

params.automateBP: The address of the set automate contract for Chromatic BPs.

automateBP().details: Retrieves the automate contract currently set for Chromatic BPs.

returns.automate: The address of the automate contract for Chromatic BPs.

bpList().details: Retrieves the list of all ChromaticBP addresses.

bpListByLP(address).details: Retrieves the list of ChromaticBP addresses associated with a specific ChromaticLP.

params.config: The configuration parameters for the ChromaticBP.

setAutomateBP(address).details: Sets the automate contract for Chromatic BPs.

params.automate: The address of the automate contract for Chromatic BPs.

devdoc.title: ChromaticBPFactory
